lemma ZObis_transC2[consumes 3, case_names Match MatchO MatchS]: assumes 0: "c \<approx>01 d" and "s \<approx> t" and "(d,t) \<rightarrow>c (d',t')" and "\<And> c' s'. \<lbrakk>(c,s) \<rightarrow>c (c',s'); s' \<approx> t'; c' \<approx>01 d'\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> thesis" and "\<And> s'. \<lbrakk>(c,s) \<rightarrow>t s'; s' \<approx> t'; discr d'\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> thesis" and "\<lbrakk>s \<approx> t'; c \<approx>01 d'\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> thesis" shows thesis
